Package org.opensourcephysics.frames

Class PlotFrame

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • org.opensourcephysics.display.OSPFrame
                • org.opensourcephysics.display.DrawingFrame
                  • org.opensourcephysics.frames.PlotFrame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AppFrame, Hidable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FFTRealFrame

    public class PlotFrame
extends DrawingFrame
    PlotFrame displays a plot using a dedicated DatasetManager. PlotFrame is a composite object that forwards methods to other objects such as a DatasetManager or a DataTable.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
